amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be used to pay for storage for patrol boats procured under the Department of Navy Memorandum #105-E2P-196 dated October 12, 2010.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to pay for storage for patrol boats procured under the Department of Navy Memorandum #105-E2P-196 dated October 12, 2010.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Gosar.
